description: glance lacks both sphinx (needed for doc builds) and argparse (not part of 2.6 stdlib) which stops it from installing ... which in turn doesn't allow you to create a virtualenv to develop on nova.
title: glance lacks sphinx and argparse in pip-requires

comments.content: glance lacks both sphinx (needed for doc builds) and argparse (not part of 2.6 stdlib) which stops it from installing ... which in turn doesn't allow you to create a virtualenv to develop on nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ken-pepple

comments.content: IIUC there is nothing to do in Nova to fix this issue, so closing this task as Invalid, please reopen if you disagree
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
